comment.author: 41081439@N00
comment._content: There seems to be a problem in Australia differentiating between skis and snow shoes

comment.author: 45104424@N00
comment._content: fotoproze Skis in Australia were originally known as snowshoes. And as these people are members of the oldest ski club in the world (it still exists as the Kiandra Pioneers Ski Club) they can call them whatever they want.
